classification.positioning_context: Also suitable for protecting downline secondary-level sub-panels and equipment (datasheet statement)

overview.headline: Primary-level surge protection for service entrances up to 400 Amps
positioning_headlines: For IEEE Category B & Category C Panels / Primary Locations
Basic Primary Level Protection For Panels Up To 400 Amps
marketing_paragraphs: It isolates your sensitive downline equipment from nearby switching motor loads and in-house surges as it provides a seamless grid of pure AC power. SurgePure preserves your assets and maximizes your long-term profits!
The Mach 2 SPD System features non-degrading Single Element (SE*) surge protection. It is primary level surge protection to be located at your service entrance for up to 250kW.
overview.technical_summary: Mach 2 is a primary-level, non-degrading SPD designed for installation at the service entrance. The system emphasizes single-element surge paths (SE*) and is positioned as part of an integrated primary + secondary protection grid.

key_features: LEDs constantly monitor performance and protection status of each phase
Unique fuse-links maintain safety of high-energy, non-degrading surge capacity
Designed for easy mounting and installation for fast response-time protection
Up to 355,000 solid amps of safe, non-degrading, single-element surge protection
Integral grid of primary and secondary levels of non-degrading SPD technology provides long-term 24/7 AC power system integrity

safety_ratings_and_claims.type_rating_claim: Safety rated as SPD Type 1 & Type 2
safety_ratings_and_claims.element_definition_claim: SE* indicates single element for each surge path (datasheet notation)
additional_claims: Primary level protection for service entrance applications
Also intended for downline secondary protection contexts as part of an SPD grid

surge_path_technology.label: SE*
surge_path_technology.meaning: Single Element for each surge path

safety_and_compliance.safety_rating_statement: Safety rated as SPD Type 1 & Type 2 with the TVSS industry’s highest safety SCCR rating of 200kAIC
safety_and_compliance.overcurrent_protection: Type 1 & Type 2, no breaker required; optional 20A breaker for fast panel installations (CODE RULE 26-420)

status_indicators.description: Lifetime green LED self-test protection status monitors for each phase

notes: Marketing/context blocks are captured from the Mach 2 datasheet page and included intentionally for downstream synthesis.
Model-specific numeric specs are bound to this column only.
